Text: Its actually 2.5D... But its ok. Entertained game, sometimes it gets a bit dull. Its somehow difficult in Solo Mode. And the AI of the enemies is pathetic. Artwork is pretty good, reminds me of Torchlight.
Are save game working on this one or should we still use the reloaded proper crack?
Also why is the DLC nearly double the size of the original game?
How do you exactly update the game? I put it in my Sacred Citadel program files but it doesnt work. I also tried to just start it up on the ISO location but nothing... Help?
